column14: I bought this because I had previously used a freind's and LOVED it. The product itself is amazing. It smells really good and doesn't leave that weird greasy, slimy feel on your hands after using it. Keeps my super dry hands very mousturized, even now when I am constantly washing and sanitizing my hands. However, if you can, buy it directly from the store or on The Body Shop's website. I would not advise buying it on Amazon. There was no protective seal on it and the tube arrived squished, almost as if someone had used it before. And if that wasn't bad enough, the date on the back of the tube says 2018. That's TWO YEARS ago. I am not sure that I want to use the product at this point. If you can, just buy it directly from the Body Shop. Don't trust this seller.
